1.ep: I Will Love You Tomorrow S1E1
1.title: Spring Affair 1
body: Oh thou magnificent colour of Love, Alluring wonder of early evening. Thou artistic canvas in the sky So graciously beautiful to behold...
I’ll embrace you adorable colour blue, Thou art the hottest and brightest flame, Efficient in the kitchen of life’s passion. The fore runner of culinary expertise Preparing sumptuous feasts...

I’ll patiently wait for tomorrow, I’ll say no to tempting tempests of hot flushes Indeed, flashes of goose pimples are mundane, The fire from real love’s blue flame, Is the soothing and perfect everlasting bliss!

It was early evening. The crickets were making their sounds while the fireflies Produced illuminating sparks of light as the sun was on her homeward journey. Some stars from the blue sky produced spiral lines of light. These formed rainbow lines which ultimately fell unto the earth like golden balls on the towering jacarandas that surrounded our farm house.

The jacarandas danced as the soft winds of spring made them produce whispering sounds. Together with the songs of the birds that fluttered around; a blissful atmosphere with melodious harmony was created.
